name: Act on It Home Care Inc.

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Act on It Home Care Inc. is a Early Intervention Provider Agency provider based in Flushing, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $57.4M in Medicaid payments across 382K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $57.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
